body:
Fixes this issue: https://github.com/spack/spack/issues/25225

A fix is in STRUMPACK master, so will be in future releases:
https://github.com/pghysels/STRUMPACK/commit/23f2e974e51306f3a4c6eec5463480d080dfc411

@eugeneswalker could you try this?
title: strumpack: Patch for building shared lib when enabling ROCm.
